About FitNesse Launcher Parent

Provides ability to launch FitNesse as a wiki server, or automatically run FitNesse tests as part of a standard integration-test / verify build. Allows configuration of FitNesse's classpath through plugin dependencies, and injects all Maven project properties as FitNesse variables, ( which can be overridden from the command line using '-D' ).

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
FitNesse Launcher Maven PluginProvides ability to launch FitNesse as a wiki server, or automatically run FitNesse tests as part of a standard integration-test / verify build. Allows configuration of FitNesse's classpath through plugin dependencies, and injects all Maven project properties as FitNesse variables, ( which can be overridden from the command line using '-D' ).
